CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many stages are there in this funnel chart?

SRP.Q: Is the Browse Course Page stage positioned above or below the Complete the assignment stage?
SRP.A: The Browse Course Page stage is positioned {above} the Complete the assignment stage.

VPR.Q: What pattern does the data reduction follow in this funnel chart?
VPR.A: The data reduction follows a {linear} pattern.

VE.Q: What is the value of stage Complete the first lesson?
VE.A: The value of stage Complete the first lesson is {54%}.

VE.Q: What is the value of stage Register Courses?
VE.A: The value of stage Register Courses is {69%}.

EVJ.Q: What is the maximum value in the funnel chart?
EVJ.A: The stage with the highest value is Browse Course Page, with a value of {100%}.

EVJ.Q: What is the minimum value in the funnel chart?
EVJ.A: The stage with the lowest value is Pass the final test, with a value of {27%}.

SC.Q: What is the percentage reduction from stage Register Learning Platform to stage Register Courses?
SC.A: The percentage reduction from stage Register Learning Platform to stage Register Courses is {14%}.

SC.Q: What is the percentage reduction from stage Browse Course Page to stage Register Learning Platform?
SC.A: The percentage reduction from stage Browse Course Page to stage Register Learning Platform is {17%}.

NF.Q: In which stages of the funnel chart does the value exceed 76%? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
NF.A: The {Browse Course Page} stage has {100%}, the {Register Learning Platform} stage has {83%}.

NF.Q: In which stages of the funnel chart does the value fall below 33%? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
NF.A: The {Pass the final test} stage has {27%}.

NF.Q: In which stages of the funnel chart does the value fall between 46% and 76%? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
NF.A: The {Register Courses} stage has {69%}, the {Complete the first lesson} stage has {54%}.

NC.Q: Which reduction is greater: from stage Complete the assignment to Pass the final test, or from stage Complete the first lesson to Complete the assignment?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {Complete the first lesson} to {Complete the assignment} is greater.

NC.Q: Which reduction is the greatest: from stage Register Learning Platform to Register Courses, from stage Register Courses to Complete the first lesson, or from stage Complete the assignment to Pass the final test?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {Register Courses} to stage {Complete the first lesson} is the greatest.

MSR.Q: Between which two consecutive stages in the funnel chart is the conversion rate drop the largest?
MSR.A: The largest drop in conversion rate occurs between the {Browse Course Page} and {Register Learning Platform} stages.

MSR.Q: Between which two consecutive stages in the funnel chart is the conversion rate drop the smallest?
MSR.A: The smallest drop in conversion rate occurs between the {Complete the assignment} and {Pass the final test} stages.
